awd_abstract_narration: The Center for Advanced Study in Education at                                   the City University of New York will conduct a                                  three-year project designed to increase women's                                 persistence in education and careers in                                         mathematics, science and technology.  This                                      multi-institutional project will involve 60 teacher                             educators at 20 undergraduate institutions.  The                                objectives of this program are as follows:  1.                                  determine the extent to which gender equity in                                  mathematics, science and technology is or is not                                taught to preservice teachers at the                                            undergraduate level; 2.  assist participating                                   teacher educators to teach about gender equity                                  in mathematics, science and technology; and 3.                                  focus the attention of teacher education                                        organizations on the gender equity issue.                                       Activities of the project include:  1.  the                                     development of modules for use at the                                           elementary and secondary levels in mathematics,                                 science and technology education; 2.  the                                       sponsoring of meetings for teacher education                                    professional associations in order to advance the                               gender equity issue; and 3.  the dissemination of                               project publications.  It is expected that over                                 2,400 preservice teachers will be impacted by                                   this project.
org_div_long_name: Div. of Equity for Excellence in STEM
